description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato Pie With Pecan Crumble recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Crumble,Pescatarian,High fibre,Seafood free,Low salt,Sweet potato,Peanut free
name: Sweet Potato Pie With Pecan Crumble Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Grease an 11x35cm rectangle tart tin with removable base. Roll out pastry between 2 sheets of baking paper until large enough to line base and sides of tin. Trim excess. Refrigerate for 15 minutes.

Place tin on baking tray. Line pastry case with baking paper. Fill with pie weights or uncooked rice. Bake for 12 minutes or until edges are light golden. Remove weights and paper. Bake for a further 8 minutes or until base is light golden. Set aside to cool.
Meanwhile, steam sweet potato over a pan of simmering water for 30 minutes or until tender. Drain and cool for 15 minutes. Discard liquid. Mash until smooth.
Using an electric mixer, beat eggs, sugar, maple syrup, mixed spice and ginger until thick and pale. Add evaporated milk and sweet potato and beat until smooth and combined.
Pour mixture into pastry case and bake for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 180°C. Bake for a further 15 minutes or until almost set.

Meanwhile, to make the crumble, rub butter, flour and sugar together with your fingertips until mixture resembles coarse breadcrumbs. Stir in pecans. Scatter mixture over pie. Bake for a further 10 minutes. Set aside to cool completely. Slice and serve.
